title: Every man for himself
creator_credit: Arthur Bedford, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: Hiding from the Germans amongst olive trees in Greece, Arthur Bedford and his fellow soldiers were told to get out. “Every man for himself”. Not only did they manage to escape, they managed to fend off a enemy bombing attack and didn’t suffer a single casualty.
creator_credit_for_label: Arthur Bedford, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
